name: gitbook_regexp_2
description: ##为何要用正则? 正则表达式是为了专门解决文本的两个问题而产生的：

scripts.push-master: git checkout master && git add --all && git commit -m 'source files update' && git push origin master
scripts.push-gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && cp _book/* . && git add --all && git commit -m 'new build' && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.deploy: npm run push-master && npm run push-gh-pages

author: zilong-thu
